DOC.brief_title: Effect Dietary Fat Type Combination With High Protein Plasma Homocysteine Levels
DOC.detailed_description: The experimental comprise 30 % kcal fat , 20 % kcal protein 50 % kcal carbohydrate . Each test fat [ palm olein ( POo ) , virgin olive oil ( OO ) coconut oil ( CO ) ] contribute two-thirds total dietary fat compare . Three meal day provide 2000 kcal , include breakfast , lunch dinner provide 5-weeks period fat rotation . 45 volunteer feed normal cooking oil 3 week standardisation purpose . They stratify 3 group accord gender , homocysteine cholesterol level . The volunteer randomize , blind undergo 3 arm crossover intervention . Each intervention take 5 wk 2 wk wash . Baseline blood sample take blood sample collect week-4 -5 study .
